briefdescription.para: Main loop infinetely calls game_func() specified in initialization before while maintaining all gamepad system processes.
Some system level subprocesses are blocked during game_func() handling. Call this function to avoid long-term system delay.
API initialization function. Takes control under the device, managing hardware and system.

parameterdescription.para: game infitite loop, executes during Gamepad::main_loop()

briefdescription.para: Call is necessary to initialize SD card. Game won't be launched withoud SD inserted. Otherwise gamepad ignore SD completely.

simplesect.para: battery level in range from 0 to BATTERY_LEVELS
Function takes a while (~37ms at max ESP32 SPI frequency)

briefdescription.para: Transfers image buffer to display on different core.

simplesect.para: May be unstable if core2 is busy

parameterdescription.para: update will try to maintain stable fps (if render speed is enough)

briefdescription.para: Checks if it is possible to perform Gamepad::update_display_threaded().

simplesect.para: true: means previous update has finished
false: if previous update is in progress

parameterdescription.para: value in range from 0 to BRIGHTNESS_LEVELS

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t width, uint16_t height, uint16_t x=0, uint16_t y=0, uint8_t color_depth=8)
memberdef.name: create_layer

briefdescription.para: Creates a layer which will be rendered above the main canvas.

simplesect.para: Creation of the layer creates new image buffer with a size of W * H * color_depth / 8 bytes. If there is not enough memory layer won't be created
Layers arranged by their creation order
Layers are rendered directly from memory separately, which can cause flickering for frequent updates

briefdescription.para: Enter gamepad hardware config setup menu.
Opens gamepad file manager at game source folder as root.

simplesect.para: String: absolute path to file selected by user
